title: Enterprise RAG Chatbot Microservice
subtitle: Production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation chatbot built for enterprise scale.
description: production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot microservice built with FastAPI, designed for enterprise workloads requiring high performance, scalability, and reliability. The service delivers real-time streaming responses, robust LLM caching, advanced vector search, and a seamless knowledge ingestion pipeline, all wrapped in a clean

title: Enterprise Legal Research Agent Chatbot
subtitle: AI-powered legal research assistant with modern Next.js frontend.
description: An advanced legal research tool that combines a responsive Next.js frontend with a powerful backend powered by LangGraph and FastAPI. It utilizes LLMs to parse and summarize complex legal documents, streamlining the research process for professionals.

title: Adversarial Training in One-Shot Models
subtitle: Researching robustness in Tamil handwritten text classification.
description: An academic research project exploring adversarial training techniques to improve the robustness and accuracy of one-shot learning models, specifically applied to the challenging task of Tamil handwritten text classification using PyTorch and TensorFlow.

title: MLOps ETL Network Project
subtitle: End-to-end MLOps pipeline for seamless model deployment.
description: A comprehensive MLOps solution facilitating end-to-end machine learning operationalization. It integrates FastAPI for serving, Docker for containerization, MLflow for experiment tracking, and GitHub Actions for CI/CD, all deployed on AWS infrastructure.

title: RAG Personalized Recommendation System
subtitle: LLM-driven personalization using Gemma-2b and RAG.
description: A sophisticated recommendation engine that merges Large Language Models (LLMs) with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). specifically utilizing the Gemma-2b model to deliver highly personalized content suggestions.

title: Sales Data Azure ETL Pipeline
subtitle: Scalable cloud data engineering pipeline on Azure.
description: A robust data engineering project demonstrating a scalable ETL pipeline. It captures sales data, processes it using Azure Data Factory and Databricks, and prepares it for analytics, showcasing modern cloud data warehousing practices.
